name: Of Mice & Mozzarella
description:
In Of Mice & Mozzerella, you play as a mouse on it's journey back to it's home after scoring the meal of a lifetime: a whole pepperoni pizza! Journey through a post-apocalyptic city and listen to the Mouse's dear tale as you push your pizza home.

Developed by myself as part of the the July 2020 GAD Game Jam on the University of Plymouth Game Arts and Design course, under the theme: "Please remain calm, the end has arrived."

Music by shreddingDemon: https://shreddingdemon.itch.io/

Controls:

WASD - Move/Push Pizza

Spacebar - Jump

Mouse - Look/Aim (Standard Assets 3rd person controller)
